You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a clear blue sky with a small airplane flying over a large body of water. On the water, there are numerous sailboats scattered across the surface, with some closer to the foreground and others further away. The water appears calm, and the boats are sailing in various directions. In the distance, there is a city skyline with buildings of different heights, suggesting a coastal city. The overall scene is serene and suggests a sunny day with good weather conditions for
